txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Piles of Sparkling Dust from the shades in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the piles of sparkling dust for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough piles of sparkling dust to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Piles of Sparkling Dust
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect piles of sparkling dust from shades. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the piles of sparkling dust to any task-board in Great River.
You have accepted a task to acquire piles of sparkling dust.
Wanted: Piles of Sparkling Dust from the shades in the Great River region.
